org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

类 SharedSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.Slot
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.SharedSlot

  • public class SharedSlot
extends Slot
    This class represents a shared slot. A shared slot can have multiple SimpleSlot instances within itself. This allows to schedule multiple tasks simultaneously to the same resource. Sharing a resource with multiple tasks is crucial for simple pipelined / streamed execution, where both the sender and the receiver are typically active at the same time.

    IMPORTANT: This class contains no synchronization. Thus, the caller has to guarantee proper synchronization. In the current implementation, all concurrently modifying operations are passed through a SlotSharingGroupAssignment object which is responsible for synchronization.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private SlotSharingGroupAssignment assignmentGroup
      The assignment group os shared slots that manages the availability and release of the slots
      private java.util.Set<Slot> subSlots
      The set os sub-slots allocated from this shared slot

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SharedSlot

        public SharedSlot(JobID jobID,
                  SlotOwner owner,
                  TaskManagerLocation location,
                  int slotNumber,
                  TaskManagerGateway taskManagerGateway,
                  SlotSharingGroupAssignment assignmentGroup)
        Creates a new shared slot that has no parent (is a root slot) and does not belong to any task group. This constructor is used to create a slot directly from an instance.
        参数:
        jobID - The ID of the job that the slot is created for.
        owner - The component from which this slot is allocated.
        location - The location info of the TaskManager where the slot was allocated from
        slotNumber - The number of the slot.
        taskManagerGateway - The gateway to communicate with the TaskManager
        assignmentGroup - The assignment group that this shared slot belongs to.

      • SharedSlot

        public SharedSlot(JobID jobID,
                  SlotOwner owner,
                  TaskManagerLocation location,
                  int slotNumber,
                  TaskManagerGateway taskManagerGateway,
                  SlotSharingGroupAssignment assignmentGroup,
                  @Nullable
                  SharedSlot parent,
                  @Nullable
                  AbstractID groupId)
        Creates a new shared slot that has is a sub-slot of the given parent shared slot, and that belongs to the given task group.
        参数:
        jobID - The ID of the job that the slot is created for.
        owner - The component from which this slot is allocated.
        location - The location info of the TaskManager where the slot was allocated from
        slotNumber - The number of the slot.
        taskManagerGateway - The gateway to communicate with the TaskManager
        assignmentGroup - The assignment group that this shared slot belongs to.
        parent - The parent slot of this slot.
        groupId - The assignment group of this slot.

      • SharedSlot

        public SharedSlot(AllocatedSlot allocatedSlot,
                  SlotOwner owner,
                  SlotSharingGroupAssignment assignmentGroup)
        Creates a new shared slot that has no parent (is a root slot) and does not belong to any task group. This constructor is used to create a slot directly from an instance.
        参数:
        allocatedSlot - The allocated slot that this slot represents.
        owner - The component from which this slot is allocated.
        assignmentGroup - The assignment group that this shared slot belongs to.

      • SharedSlot

        public SharedSlot(SharedSlot parent,
                  SlotOwner owner,
                  int slotNumber,
                  SlotSharingGroupAssignment assignmentGroup,
                  AbstractID groupId)
        Creates a new shared slot that is a sub-slot of the given parent shared slot, and that belongs to the given task group.
        参数:
        parent - The parent slot of this slot.
        owner - The component from which this slot is allocated.
        slotNumber - The number of the slot.
        assignmentGroup - The assignment group that this shared slot belongs to.
        groupId - The assignment group of this slot.

      • getNumberLeaves

        public int getNumberLeaves()
        从类复制的说明: Slot
        Gets the number of simple slots that are at the leaves of the tree of slots.
        指定者:
        getNumberLeaves 在类中 Slot
        返回:
        The number of simple slots at the leaves.

      • isRootAndEmpty

        public boolean isRootAndEmpty()
        Checks whether this slot is a root slot that has not yet added any child slots.
        返回:
        True, if this slot is a root slot and has not yet added any children, false otherwise.

      • hasChildren

        public boolean hasChildren()
        Checks whether this shared slot has any sub slots.
        返回:
        True, if the shared slot has sub slots, false otherwise.

      • releaseSlot

        public void releaseSlot()
        从类复制的说明: Slot
        This method cancels and releases the slot and all its sub-slots. After this method completed successfully, the slot will be in state "released", and the Slot.isReleased() method will return true. If this slot is a simple slot, it will be returned to its instance. If it is a shared slot, it will release all of its sub-slots and release itself.
        指定者:
        releaseSlot 在类中 Slot

      • getSubSlots

        java.util.Set<Slot> getSubSlots()
        Gets the set of all slots allocated as sub-slots of this shared slot.
        返回:
        All sub-slots allocated from this shared slot.

      • allocateSubSlot

        SimpleSlot allocateSubSlot(AbstractID groupId)
        Creates a new sub slot if the slot is not dead, yet. This method should only be called from the assignment group instance to guarantee synchronization. NOTE: This method is not synchronized and must only be called from the slot's assignment group.
        参数:
        groupId - The ID to identify tasks which can be deployed in this sub slot.
        返回:
        The new sub slot if the shared slot is still alive, otherwise null.

      • allocateSharedSlot

        SharedSlot allocateSharedSlot(AbstractID groupId)
        Creates a new sub slot if the slot is not dead, yet. This method should only be called from the assignment group instance to guarantee synchronization. NOTE: This method should only be called from the slot's assignment group.
        参数:
        groupId - The ID to identify tasks which can be deployed in this sub slot.
        返回:
        The new sub slot if the shared slot is still alive, otherwise null.

      • releaseChild

        void releaseChild(SimpleSlot slot)
        Disposes the given sub slot. This method is called by the child simple slot to tell this shared slot to release it. The releasing process itself is done by the SlotSharingGroupAssignment, which controls all the modifications in this shared slot. NOTE: This method must not modify the shared slot directly !!!
        参数:
        slot - The sub-slot which shall be removed from the shared slot.

      • removeDisposedChildSlot

        int removeDisposedChildSlot(Slot slot)
        Removes the given slot from this shared slot. This method Should only be called through this shared slot's SlotSharingGroupAssignment
        参数:
        slot - slot to be removed from the set of sub slots.
        返回:
        Number of remaining sub slots

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 Slot
